page.title: 01Our Area
page.content: There is a primary school in Church Langton with 67 children.They go to Kibworth High School at 11.There are three pubs:The Bakers Arms at Thorpe Langton,The Langton Arms in Church Langton and The Bell Inn at East Langton.There's a brook near The Baker's Arms and a private lake at East Langton. Most houses are private but some are council owned. Most fields are pasture land,a few are crops. About fourteen farmers own the land; six of them live in farmhouses in the area. There are hills called The Caudles. There are post boxes in 3 villages,telephone boxes in East and Thorpe Langton, a public playing field in Church Langton,a cricket field in East Langton. A baker's van comes twice a week,a grocer and a library van once a week. There are churches in Thorpe and Church Langton.
